page.title: 16EDWARD PLANT'S FISH SHOP
page.content: Edward Plant owns the fish shop at Quarrington Hill.He sells different types of fish like plaice,cod and haddock.He also sells sweets and cans of pop.The fish shop has 3 big friers and an automatic chip cutter.They have a big counter too where they keep the money and paper bags to wrap up the fish and chips. Edward has a white hat and red and white apron over white trousers, Mrs.Plant wears a red skirt. I like their fish and chips and I often go to their shop. Edward goes to Hartlepool for his fish he buys his potatoes from a merchant. He makes curry and mushy peas too. His opening times are 11.00am-1.00pm on Friday and Saturday,and 7.30pm-9.30 pm on Monday,Tuesday,Thursday and Friday.
